name: STARWARD ROGUE
summary: Starward Rogue is a bullet hell twin-stick shooter. Blast your way through the Megalith, a rogue-lite labyrinth lodged in the side of a star. Customize your mech with a huge variety of weapons, perks, and upgrades. Steel yourself for the dangers that lurk in the depths of the dungeon.
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2016年1月22日
  • 售价: ￥40
  • 开发商: Arcen Games, LLC
  • 发行: Arcen Games, LLC
